Sipna College of Enginnering And Technology, Amravati

Event Name : Technical Quiz

Date and Time : 8th February 2024

Location : Sipna College of Engineering And Technology, Amravati

Entry Fees : 100/- per participants.

Prizes :
Winner :₹3000
Runner Up: ₹2000

    Round 1: Basic Engineering Technical GK
  • 1) Number of questions - 50
  • 2) Time to solve - 20 mins
  • 3) Topics-Basic engineering, General science, etc
  • 4) No negative marking.
    Round 2: Image Identification
  • 1) Number of questions - 20
  • 2) Time to solve - 10 min
  • 3) Topic - General
    Round 3: Rapid Fire
  • 1) Time allotted - 90 sec per each
  • 2) Maximum question attempt
    Round 4: Quizzy Buzzers
  • 1) Questions will be announced verbally
  • 2) First come first serve.

Rules & Regulations

  • 1. No electronic devices are allowed.
  • 2. Only single entry will be considered.
  • 3. In each round elimination will be based on cut off value.
  • 4. In case of tie there will be an another round.
  • 5. Regarding the round conduction, instructions will be shared at execution time.
  • 6. Bring your college ID Cards and Receipt on event day
  • 7. All the participants will be awarded with "Participation Certificates."
